articles.description: Bajaj has finally released a teaser video of its most awaited CNG motorcycle which is currently rumoured to be called the Bruzer. The official launch of this bike will take place in two days on 5 July.
articles.content:
- New Bajaj CNG bike teased
- Gets CNG & petrol button
- Launch on 5 July

articles.content:
